summary: Completed testing of node type refactoring feature: split 'template' into user_input, format_template, batch_prompt_template. All backend tests (10/10) PASSED. Frontend tests verified new node types in dropdown, NodeConfigPanel shows correct settings, and wizard treats new types correctly. Backward compatibility with legacy 'template' type confirmed.
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted test pipelines: TEST_UserInputPipeline, TEST_FormatTemplatePipeline, TEST_BatchPromptTemplatePipeline, TEST_LegacyTemplatePipeline, TEST_UpdateWithNewTypes, TEST_UserInputVarConfig, TEST_BatchLoopVars
context_for_next_testing_agent: Node type refactoring fully tested. 3 new node types verified: user_input (displays as 'ВВОД ДАННЫХ'), format_template (displays as 'ФОРМАТИРОВАНИЕ'), batch_prompt_template (displays as 'БАТЧ-ШАБЛОН'). All appear in pipeline editor dropdown. NodeConfigPanel shows correct fields: user_input shows template_text + variable_config, format_template shows template_text only, batch_prompt_template shows template_text + loop_vars. Legacy 'template' type still works for backward compatibility. Pipeline validation works with new types. Wizard correctly treats user_input as interactive step.

new_node_types_in_dropdown.details: All 3 new types appear in 'Add node' dropdown: 'Ввод данных' (user_input), 'Форматирование' (format_template), 'Батч-шаблон' (batch_prompt_template)

existing_pipelines_display.details: Pipeline d756739d-a179-4e4d-9633-8d59e68cecd3 shows user_input node as 'ВВОД ДАННЫХ'. Pipeline 0190dd20-6883-4ac2-b038-9beeecc43926 shows batch_prompt_template node as 'БАТЧ-ШАБЛОН'

node_config_panel.details: user_input shows template_text field and wizard settings toggle. Config panel correctly identifies node type label.

pipeline_validation.details: No validation errors displayed for pipelines with new node types

wizard_interactive_treatment.details: FullAnalysisTab wizard correctly shows wizard steps for interactive nodes (user_input as step 3). Pipeline selector and 'Запустить сценарий' button work correctly.

backend_api_accepts_new_types.details: All CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) work with user_input, format_template, batch_prompt_template node types. loop_vars and variable_config correctly saved.

backward_compatibility.details: Legacy 'template' node type still works - can create pipelines with template type, node_type is preserved in database

frontend_tests.pipeline_editor_dropdown: PASS - All 9 node types visible including 3 new ones
frontend_tests.node_config_panel: PASS - Shows correct fields for user_input type
frontend_tests.wizard_analysis_tab: PASS - Pipeline selector and start button functional
